article.title: Oakland U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Oakland U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

Rod Hirsch, Director

Email:Rod.Hirsch@trade.gov

Phone: (510) 273-7350

Fax: (510) 273-7352

Sectors
Environmental Technologies| Food Processing & Packaging | Building Materials | Maritime & Port Development | Construction Equipment |Consumer Goods|Industrial/Commercial Equipment

Teams

Core Member - Environmental Technology Team, Agri-Business Team, Africa Near East South Asia (ANESA) Team Associate Member - Renewable Energy Team

​

Cindy Ma, International Trade Specialist

Email:Cindy.Ma@trade.gov

Phone: (510) 273-7351

Fax: (510) 273-7352

Sectors
Biotechnology |Consumer Electronics | Cosmetics/Toiletry | Computer Peripherals | Computer Services | Computer Software | Education/Training Services | Medical/Pharmaceutical | Telecommunications Services | Telecommunications Equipment | Travel and Tourism Industries

Teams

Core Member - Information Communication Technology (ICT) Team Associate Member - Asia Pacific Team

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​​​

​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Oakland U.S. Export Assistance Center.
